home.simplifyDescription: Experience a seamless and secure transaction environment and automated invoicing with Nefentus. Designed for your business to cater to the diverse needs of businesses and customers.

home.aboutCard1Title: Except A Wide Variety Cryptocurrencies Without Risk
home.aboutCard1Description: Our smart contract based technology eliminates cryptocurrency volatility through instantly converting cryptocurrency payments into stable coins in your wallet. Securely accept a range of crypto currencies and offer payment flexibility to your customers.
home.aboutCard2Description: Our advanced dashboards enable you to gain deeper insights and make data-driven decisions with ease, improving your productivity and profitability.
home.aboutCard3Description: Integrating your financial stack with our platform offers access to 200+ crypto wallets, streamlines operations, and enhances financial control.

payment.heroDescription: Experience the future of finance by revolutionizing your invoicing and payment processes with our advanced automation tools and secure crypto-based checkouts, simplifying financial management and maximizing revenue potential.

growContent.title: Effortlessly Accept a Wide Range of Cryptos Securely:
growContent.description: Our smart contract technology is engineered to tackle the roller-coaster ride of cryptocurrency prices. When your customers make payments using cryptocurrencies, our smart contracts swing into action, seamlessly converting those payments into stablecoins. This instant conversion ensures that the value of your received payments remains steady, effectively shielding your business from the unpredictable price fluctuations often associated with the crypto market.

growContent.title: Get Started In Less Than 5 Minutes:
growContent.description: At Nefentus, we value your time. That's why we've streamlined the process to help you create your account and connect your wallet in less than 5 minutes. For EU residents, a KYC process is required. Don't worry if you don't have a wallet yet! Nefentus automatically creates one for you. However, if you prefer to use your existing wallet, you can easily link it to our system. Start your journey with Nefentus today and experience the freedom and flexibility that cryptocurrencies offer!

growContent.title: Easy Transaction Management:
growContent.description: Effortlessly accept payments: generate QR codes or payment links for customers to pay with any of our accepted cryptocurrencies. Track the payment process in real time and benefit from automatically created and sent invoices.

payment.iconDescription: Our platform is not just a gateway; it's a powerhouse of flexibility and scalability. Customize your payment capabilities to suit your unique needs and seize the opportunities presented by today's dynamic and ever-changing payment landscape. Stay ahead of the curve and transform your business.

whyContent.title: Made in Europe
whyContent.description: Our in-house team of expert IT specialists continuously develops and improves Nefentus to the highest standards,

whyContent.title: GDPR compliant
whyContent.description: We prioritize data protection, adhering to the highest security and privacy standards to ensure the protection of your company and customers' data.

whyContent.title: Secure
whyContent.description: With our powerful and secure servers that offer 100% availability, you can trust that your website will always be accessible, and your data will always be safe.

dataContent.title: 3.5% Commission
dataContent.description: Experience unparalleled payment processing, featuring strong conversion rates, popular and intuitive payment methods, and fast, safe transactions.

dataContent.title: Smart Analytics
dataContent.description: We calculate key metrics for your business and keep track of your growth effortlessly.

dataContent.title: Automatons
dataContent.description: Nefentus saves you from manual invoicing and simplifies your accounting.

dataContent.title: Digital Products
dataContent.description: Securely upload digital products once to Nefentus and make them available for download after purchase, without any third-party providers.

paymentCard2: All benefits of the Basic-Vendor package
Support via phone and video by a dedicated  account manager
Free access to our private support group for questions, answers and discussion

payroll.heroDescription: Simplify your payroll process with Nefentus' flexible and efficient crypto and FIAT payroll solutions. Add employees, set salaries, and pay with ease, all while taking advantage of the benefits of cryptocurrency. With our comprehensive reporting tools, you can gain valuable insights into your payroll data, enabling you to optimize your operations for improved productivity and profitability.
payroll.manageDescription: Empower your employees with Nefentus' advanced crypto payroll solutions, enabling you to pay full or partial salaries and bonuses in cryptocurrency, as well as allocate shares of your token to build loyalty and incentivize productivity.
payroll.organizeDescription: Efficiently manage your payroll with Nefentus' advanced features, including multi-currency and multi-chain support, lower transaction fees for global teams, onboarding through CSV file uploads, and scheduling of recurring salaries.
payroll.trackDescription: Effortlessly review the status of all payment requests using Nefentus' visual dashboard, with the ability to easily send payment reminders to outstanding requests.
payroll.iconDescription: Simplify your payment processing with Nefentus' seamless platform, offering access to over 200 wallets for effortless acceptance and processing of cryptocurrency payments with advanced security features.

payrollContent.title: Invoicing
payrollContent.description: Your all-in-one platform to manage your invoices. Designed for Finance & Operations teams in companies.

payrollContent.title: Payroll
payrollContent.description: Processing salaries and bonuses in cryptocurrency has become increasingly popular due to its simplicity and efficiency.

payrollContent.title: Expenses
payrollContent.description: Simplify expense claims submissions for your team. Approve and reimburse expenses in crypto quickly and easily.

affiliate.heroTitle: Uncover the top 1% of affiliate program.
affiliate.heroDescription: Sign up for Nefentus' affiliate program for free and start earning commissions on autopilot.

whyContent.title: Overview
whyContent.description: At a glance, see how much you have earned and how many transactions have been completed.

whyContent.title: Leaderboard
whyContent.description: Compare your performance to other affiliates and get listed on the leaderboard.

whyContent.title: Goal function
whyContent.description: Track your commissions and compare revenues for your promoted products.

whyContent.title: Mobile App
whyContent.description: Keep track of your commissions and get notified about sales with our app.

affiliate.compareTitle: Thats how it was before and thats how we solve it...

compareContent.title: Difficulty in standing out among competitors in a crowded market
compareContent.description: With so many affiliate programs and traditional products available, it can be challenging for affiliates to differentiate themselves and their promotions from the competition. This can lead to lower engagement and sales, making it harder to earn commissions.

compareContent.title: Difficulty in standing out among competitors in a crowded market
compareContent.description: Nefentus is a revolutionary platfomr and offers its affiliates a range of marketing materials, including banners and landing pages, to help them differentiate themselves and stand out in a crowded market. Additionally, the program offers attractive commissions and a range of products and services to promote, giving affiliates a competitive edge.

compareContent.title: Dependence on the performance of the products or services
compareContent.description: Affiliates are at the mercy of the performance and quality of the products or services they are promoting. If the product or service underperforms, it can negatively impact an affiliate's reputation and earnings potential.

compareContent.title: Dependence on the performance of the products or services
compareContent.description: Nefentus is committed to providing high-quality, reliable products and services to its customers, which ultimately benefits its affiliates by maintaining a positive reputation and ensuring customer satisfaction. We have been growing  quickly and have high levels of customer satisfaction.

compareContent.title: Limited control over the product or service, including pricing
compareContent.description: Traditionally affiliates  have limited control over the products or services they promote, including pricing, customer support, and other aspects of the customer experience. This can lead to frustration or dissatisfaction among customers, which can ultimately impact an affiliate's earnings potential.

compareContent.title: Limited control over the product or service, including pricing
compareContent.description: Nefentus' customer support team is available 24/7 to handle any issues or concerns that customers may have, ensuring a positive customer experience. We also offer very competitive pricing, ensuring that our products and services remain attractive to customers and affiliates alike.

introduction.title: Welcome to the support page from Nefentus Solutions!
introduction.mainDescription: You can find all the information regarding Nefentus Solutions in this area. You can find detailed information on what you can do, links to frequently asked questions and popular blog posts, as well as a getting started guide that leads you through using the product step-by-step.
introduction.banner: We've structured the documentation page into four groups:
introduction.description3: 3. Additional resources you might find interesting
introduction.description4: 4. Ways to get in contact with us

contact.title: Create Account Today
contact.description: At Nefentus, we believe in supporting our clients every step of the way. That's why we offer free onboarding calls to assist with registration and setup. Whether you're a bar owner, consultant, coach, trainer, speaker, or agency owner, we're committed to finding the perfect solution for your unique needs.
